entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 13.13 a-b** *तथा प्रत्युक्तमिच्छामि तत्करिष्यामि ...*
Who did the Kauravas plan to kill?
A) Yudhiṣṭhira B) Bhīma C) Arjuna D) Kṛṣṇa
entry.answer: A) Yudhiṣṭhira • The verse implies the Kauravas planned to kill Yudhiṣṭhira. • Bhīma and Arjuna were later involved in battles but not the target here. • Kṛṣṇa was a charioteer and not the intended victim.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 14.14 a-b** *उक्तवानस्मि कल्याणि धर्मस्य तु परां गतिम्*
Who spoke about the highest path of dharma?
A) Bhīṣma B) Drona C) Kṛṣṇa D) Vidura
entry.answer: A) Bhīṣma • Bhīṣma is the speaker in this context. • Drona and Vidura were present but not the speaker here. • Kṛṣṇa's role was later in the war.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 15.15 a-b** *बलवांस्तु यथा धर्मं लोके पश्यति पूरुषः*
Who is described as seeing dharma in the world?
A) Bhīṣma B) Yudhiṣṭhira C) Kṛṣṇa D) Drona
entry.answer: B) Yudhiṣṭhira • Yudhiṣṭhira is the dharma king. • Bhīṣma and Drona were advisors, not the subject here. • Kṛṣṇa's role was as a guide, not the dharma-seer.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 16.16 a-b** *न विवेक्तुं च ते प्रश्नमेतं शक्नोमि निश्चयात्*
Who could not decide the question?
A) Bhīma B) Yudhiṣṭhira C) Drona D) Kṛṣṇa
entry.answer: B) Yudhiṣṭhira • Yudhiṣṭhira's indecision is implied. • Bhīma and Drona were more decisive. • Kṛṣṇa's role was to advise, not decide.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 17.17 a-b** *नूनमन्तः कुलस्यास्य भविता नचिरादिव*
Who was destined to fall from the family?
A) Duryodhana B) Bhīma C) Arjuna D) Kṛṣṇa
entry.answer: A) Duryodhana • Duryodhana's downfall is foretold. • Bhīma and Arjuna were victors. • Kṛṣṇa's role was to guide the Pandavas.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 18.18 a-b** *कुलेषु जाताः कल्याणि व्यसनाभ्याहता भृशम्*
Who were deeply affected by misfortune?
A) Pandavas B) Kauravas C) Bhīma D) Drona
entry.answer: B) Kauravas • The Kauravas faced great misfortune. • Pandavas were later victorious. • Bhīma and Drona were individuals, not the group.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 19.19 a-b** *उपपन्नं च पाञ्चालि तवेदं वृत्तमीदृशम्*
Who was the subject of this event?
A) Draupadi B) Kṛṣṇa C) Bhīma D) Drona
entry.answer: A) Draupadi • Draupadi's plight is described. • Kṛṣṇa and Bhīma were involved in her rescue. • Drona was a neutral figure.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 20.20 a-b** *एते द्रोणादयश्चैव वृद्धा धर्मविदो जनाः*
Who were the wise elders?
A) Drona and Bhīṣma B) Arjuna and Kṛṣṇa C) Yudhiṣṭhira and Draupadi D) Karna and Duryodhana
entry.answer: A) Drona and Bhīṣma • Drona and Bhīṣma were the elders. • Arjuna and Kṛṣṇa were younger warriors. • Karna and Duryodhana were Kauravas.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 21.21 a-b** *युधिष्ठिरस्तु प्रश्नेऽस्मिन्प्रमाणमिति मे मतिः*
Who was the one who decided the question?
A) Yudhiṣṭhira B) Bhīma C) Drona D) Kṛṣṇa
entry.answer: A) Yudhiṣṭhira • Yudhiṣṭhira's judgment is emphasized. • Bhīma and Drona were advisors. • Kṛṣṇa's role was to guide, not decide.

entry.question:
**Anudhyuta-parvan 22.22 a-b** *तथा तु दृष्ट्वा बहु तत्तदेवं; रोरूयमाणां कुररीमिवार्ताम्*
Who was described as weeping like a cow?
A) Duryodhana B) Bhīma C) Yudhiṣṭhira D) Kṛṣṇa
entry.answer: A) Duryodhana • Duryodhana's lament is implied. • Bhīma and Yudhiṣṭhira were more resolute. • Kṛṣṇa remained composed.
